description: Subtle adjustments to achieve a natural, balanced sound with reduced low-end rumble and enhanced high-frequency detail and 'air'.

bands.notes: Gentle cut to remove subsonic rumble, noise, or venue floor vibrations without affecting musical bass.
Small cut to reduce slight 'boominess' which can cloud the lower strings and percussion.
Neutral, preserving the warmth of cellos and basses.
Neutral, preserving the lower register of instruments.
Very slight boost to add a touch of fullness to the middle range of instruments like violas and horns.
Neutral, the core clarity and balance point for most classical mixes.
Small boost to enhance instrumental presence and definition, particularly for upper-register strings and woodwinds.
Boost to improve articulation, clarity, and the 'edge' of instruments without introducing harshness.
Moderate boost to add high-frequency sparkle, 'air,' and the sense of space/reverb (hall acoustics).
Small boost for high-end extension and detail.
